Stylesheets

The Qt stylesheets used in this GUI is a modified version of Qt Dark Orange from http://tech-artists.org/forum/showthread.php?2359-Release-Qt-dark-orange-stylesheet by LoneWolf and Aqua, MacOS & Ubuntu, which are (c) 2018 Jaime Quiroga.
